Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Repeals provisions of law relating to individual apartment improvement rent increases
Summary: Repeals provisions of law relating to individual apartment improvement rent increases.
LawCode: Rpld §6 sub d ¶1, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; rpld §26-511 sub c ¶13, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal paragraph 1 of subdivision d of section 6 of section 4 of the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, relating to individual apartment improvement rent increases; and to repeal paragraph 13 of subdivision c of section 26-511 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to individual apartment improvement rent increases
